The officer Limier: Symbols Isthiny - primitive and intemperance. If hovering her power over the world, then by all the countries will be fruitful mad terrible monsters. And by the will of Shilen monsters will attack civilians. It remains to only plead the mighty intrepid travelers about them to stop Isthinu. I can turn to you to destroy Isthinu?
